ComicInfo.Title: ...Like a Diamond in the Sky!
ComicInfo.Summary: ...Like a Diamond in the Sky!: Thor and Iron Man travel to orbit to destroy the orbital computer F.A.U.S.T.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 14:17:12. [Issue ID 32259]
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
ComicInfo.Characters: Nick Fury,Scarlet Witch,Blastaar (flashback,Spider-Man [Peter Parker] (cameo),Wonder Man [Simon Williams],Nova [Richard Rider] (cameo),Captain Marvel [Mar-Vell] (cameo),F.A.U.S.T. [Fully-Automated Unit of Structural Technology],The Avengers [Iron Man [Tony Stark],Dr. Doom [Victor Von Doom] (cameo),Stilt-Man [Wilbur Day] (flashback,Vision,Beast [Henry McCoy],Thor,Captain America [Steve Rogers],Shang-Chi (cameo),Daredevil [Matt Murdock] (cameo),cameo)
